item.description:
Russian American Kids Circus

http://www.southshore...

“Thrilling,” “Spectacular,” “Enchanting,” – words cannot describe the inspiring performance of the Russian American Kids Circus. Trained by veterans of the famous Moscow Circus, young professionals between 6 and 16 years old will dazzle you with fantastic feats of acrobatics, juggling, unicycles, clowns and more! The Russian American Kids Circus has been featured on television, as well as in articles in the New York Times, the Wall Street Journal and Life Magazine. Find out for yourself why the Russian Circus is a “national cultural treasure.” It’s exhilarating fun for the entire family!

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: Russian American Kids Circus
